short_summary: Accessibility Standards Canada  requires a web services professional to maintain and develop Drupal website
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

#### English: Web Services
#### French: Services Web

3

2023-11-07T14:00:00

2023-11-07

## Tender Status
#### English: Expired
#### French: Expiré

## Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)
 None

## United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC)
* 81111612: Programming or Proprietary Languages
* 81112201: Maintenance or support fees

## Procurement Category
SRV

## Notice Type
#### English: Request for Supply Arrangement
#### French: Demande pour un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement

## Procurement Method
#### English: Competitive - Selective tendering
#### French: Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif

## Selection Criteria
#### English: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
#### French: Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix

## Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity
* National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity
#### English: Accessibility Standards Canada
#### French: Normes d'accessibilité Canada

## Contracting Entity Contact

## Tender Description

Accessibility Standards Canada is seeking professional web services for the maintenance and development of its Drupal website. The services
